original_text: The church sent them on their way, and as they traveled through Phoenicia and Samaria, they told how the Gentiles had been converted. This news made all the believers very glad.
korean_text: 그들이 교회의 전송을 받고 베니게와 사마리아로 다니며 이방인들이 주께 돌아온 일을 말하여 형제들을 다 크게 기쁘게 하더라

sentences.original_text: The church sent them on their way
and as they traveled through Phoenicia and Samaria
they told how the Gentiles had been converted
This news made all the believers very glad
sentences.korean_translation: 이 소식은 모든 신자들을 매우 기쁘게 했다
